title: Natur Premium "Organic bananas" - Grupo Iren
description: In the age of information and the internet, Natur Bananas makes connectivity between the consumer and the producer possible.
cleaned_text: of information and the internet, Natur Bananas makes connectivity between the consumer and the producer possible. By scanning the QR code of the label, the consumer or the trader will be able to obtain all the product information, know the location of the productive unit, the producer and his work team, the distribution company, etc. This guarantee of traceability is only possible thanks to the presence and control of GRUPO IREN over all the steps of the chain. With this development, GRUPO IREN takes the first steps to guarantee traceability and food in the future using Blockchain technology. DETAILS Product: Organic Banana | Dominican Republic 18Kg or 13Kg Fair
